## HTML minifier

A binding to the HTML Javascript minifier library: [html-minifier](https://github.com/kangax/html-minifier)

### Usage

To install

```{r eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_git("csgillespie/minifyHTML")
```

To use
```{r}
library(minifyHTML)
input = "<!-- foo --><div>baz</div><!-- bar\n\n moo -->"
minifyHTML(input)
minifyHTML(input, removeComments = TRUE)
```
